title: Cutting Ties
description:
Swagu and Perk discuss how the Sixers are wasting a great Joel Embiid season by not trading Ben Simmons, why James Harden may want to play in Philly, the all-timer between the Bills and Chiefs, why the Packers should want to move on from Aaron Rodgers, and show some love for Ayoka Lee for putting up 61 in an upset over Oklahoma. Let's get it!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Marcus Spears, Kendrick Perkins
